Text: It works? There is another place to download it? I can't download it with microTorrent.

This Version Is not Cracked... after a couple of hours into installation., it connects with the market and checks whether genuine and warns you to un-install the shell. you can ignore it by pressing cancel., but after 10 mins. it just vanishes returning to your default screen. If you check the SPB shell installation. it is still in your phone but you cant use it. no matter how many times you uninstall and install it., once it connects via 3g or wifi., it does its job.
